titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for certain authorized actions regarding interdiction of unmanned aircraft, and for other purposes.
Safeguarding America's Skies Act of 2018
Safeguarding America’s Skies Act of 2018
Safeguarding America's Skies Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Management Efficiency.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.
